tweet.text: Studying the history of U.S. foreign relations with the Americas? Current/recent grad students, apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications accepted until Oct. 12 https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/qQflK3EI98
